key.name: theme-name
key.description: Sets the theme used for the editing area

key.name: draw-trailing-spaces
key.description: Draw spaces which are at the end of a line

key.name: draw-leading-spaces
key.description: Draw spaces which are at the beginning of a line

key.name: draw-all-spaces
key.description: Draw spaces, no matter the position

key.name: draw-right-margin
key.description: Draw a right hand margin to limit the text width

key.name: column-right-margin
key.summary: At what column to display the margin
key.description: Sets the column at which the margin should be drawn

key.name: highlight-line
key.summary: Whether the current line should be highlighted
key.description: Sets if the current line should be highlighted, which eases navigation through the document

key.name: window-height
key.summary: Sets the height of the window in the next startup

key.name: window-width
key.summary: Sets the width of the window in the next startup

key.name: window-maximized
key.summary: Sets if the window should be maximized during the next startup

key.name: tab-size
key.description: Amount of spaces that a tab is wide

key.name: translate-tabs-to-spaces
key.description: Whether spaces should be inserted instead of tabs

key.name: use-tab-stops
key.summary: Treat indention with spaces like tabs
key.description: If translate-tabs-to-spaces is true, backspaces will delete multiple spaces, up to the previous tab stop

key.name: auto-indent
key.summary: Automatically match document's indention on newlines

key.name: word-wrap
key.summary: Wrap lines at the end of the document

key.name: draw-trailing-tabs
key.description: Draw tabs which are at the end of a line

key.name: draw-leading-tabs
key.description: Draw tabs which are at the beginning of a line

key.name: draw-all-tabs
key.description: Draw all tabs, no matter the position
